execution_plan.description: Find goods ids for the product with flavor 'apple' and food 'Tart'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE flavor = 'apple' AND food = 'Tart';

execution_plan.description: Find item records (receipts) that reference the goods ids found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Ordinal, Item FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Get receipts (ReceiptNumber) and associated CustomerId for the receipts found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve first and last names of customers whose ids match the CustomerId values from step 3.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, firstname, lastname FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step3.CustomerId);
